ourPreschool.title: Our Pre-School
ourPreschool.description: Butterfly Garden is a bilingual pre-school for tiny tots aged 3 to 6. Using the Montessori method of schooling we focus on hands-on and experience-based learning. This allows the  children to learn and develop at their own pace, just the way a catarpillar transforms into a colourful butterfly. We believe that every child is unique and deserves a chance to thrive in a multicultural environment.
ourPreschool.desc: Butterfly Garden is an after-school activity centre providing various activities for small and older children in the ages 3 to 12. We believe that each child has unique interests and abilities. We provide the space and the encouragement the children need to grow in a multicultural world and allow them to express themselves in their own way. At Butterfly Garden, children can explore their interests and learn new skills that are relevant for this day and age.
ourPreschool.description2: is a passionate teacher with over 10 years of teaching experience and a background in early childhood education. She holds a Diploma in Teachers Training, TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) from Canada, CPD (Continuing Professional Development) from the UK, and is also an Early Childhood Educator certified in the UK. She uses simple, yet new teaching methods to identify the child’s talents and skills and encourages them appropriately. She also develops the child’s personality and allows them to develop at their own pace. When Vijaya Srinath is not teaching, she deeply engages herself in her food blog ‘My Passionate Kitchen’ where she discovers and tries out new recipes.
ourPreschool.description3: Contact Vijaya Srinath for more details

about.title: About Us
about.tagline: Butterfly Garden is a bilingual school for children aged 3 to 12. Every child deserves the chance to grow like a butterfly by discovering their own interests and thriving in a multicultural world. Our school follows the Montessori approach, and focuses on self-directed, hands-on learning. We offer classes in both English and German, with a wide and diverse range of subjects.

points.title: Age-Based Learning
points.text: Children aged 3 to 5 learn best through songs, picture books, simple vocabulary building, and playful activities. From ages 6 to 8 years, they engage more with storytelling, basic reading and writing, and role-play. Between 9 and 12 years, learning focuses on essays, projects, and group discussions to build critical thinking and collaboration skills.

projects.title: 1. Gymi course - Think, Learn, Thrive!
projects.description: The Gymnasium exam is one of the most important and crucial exams in a student's school life. Entry into such a school is not just about excelling in school subjects, but also about providing opportunities for students’ future. By entering a Gymnasium, the child automatically gets a chance to enter prestigious universities, both in Switzerland and abroad. At Maven, we ensure that your child gets a smooth start into Gymnasium by providing a solid preparation with individual attention in both 1:1 and group settings.

projects.title: 2. Butterfly Garden - A Bilingual Learning Nest!
projects.description: Butterfly Garden is a nurturing bilingual school for children aged 3 to 12, where learning is rooted in discovery. We offer an immersive environment in the subjects English, German, French, Math, Science, General Knowledge, Visual learning, Art and craft, and after-school activities, blending global academic standards with hands-on exploration. Inspired by the transformation of a butterfly, we believe that every child deserves the freedom to learn, express, and grow in a multilingual, multicultural world.
